unique_featuredcategory_extended.name: Meigee - Unique/Featured Category Extended
unique_featuredcategory_extended.description: Adds a list of products from featured category with advanced parameters

template.label: Display as
template.description: If chosen slider make sure you have at least 5 products to display, otherwise widget won't be displayed.

columns_ratio.label: Columns Ratio
columns_ratio.description: First value is applied to the image, second - to the description block.

autoSlideTimer.label: Auto Slide Timer
autoSlideTimer.description: The time (in milliseconds) that a slide will wait before automatically navigating to the next slide

autoSlideTimer_2.label: Auto Slide Timer
autoSlideTimer_2.description: The time (in milliseconds) that a slide will wait before automatically navigating to the next slide

autoSlideTransTimer.label: Auto Slide Trans Timer
autoSlideTransTimer.description: The time (in milliseconds) required for all automatic animations to move between slides

autoSlideTransTimer_2.label: Auto Slide Trans Timer
autoSlideTransTimer_2.description: The time (in milliseconds) required for all automatic animations to move between slides

cache_lifetime.label: Cache Lifetime (Seconds)
cache_lifetime.description: 86400 by default, if not set. To refresh instantly, Clear the Blocks HTML Output Cache.

unique_social_links.name: Meigee - Unique/Social links widget
unique_social_links.description: Adds social links to any pages or static blocks

cache_lifetime.label: Cache Lifetime (Seconds)
cache_lifetime.description: 86400 by default, if not set. To refresh instantly, Clear the Blocks HTML Output Cache.

unique_latest_tweets.name: Meigee - Unique/Latest Tweets
unique_latest_tweets.description: Adds a list of your latest tweets

twitter_widget_id.label: Twitter Widget ID
twitter_widget_id.description: You can find it on your twitter widget settings page

tweet_limit.label: Tweet limit
tweet_limit.description: A preset number of Tweets. Value may be set between 1 and 20

cache_lifetime.label: Cache Lifetime (Seconds)
cache_lifetime.description: 86400 by default, if not set. To refresh instantly, Clear the Blocks HTML Output Cache.

unique_brandslider.name: Meigee - Unique/Brands Showcase
unique_brandslider.description: Adds a list of your manufacturers. Refer to the user guide before adding this widget

brands.label: Brands
brands.description: Select brands you want to be displayed

viewtype.label: Display as
viewtype.description: Choose "slider" option only if the sum width of your brand images is greater than 1252px, otherwise slider won't run

brandsearch.label: Link to brand search
brandsearch.description: Images will refer to search products by brand

target.label: Link target blank
target.description: Choose "Yes" if you want open links in a new tab

imagesformat.label: Images Format
imagesformat.description: All of your images must have the same format

cache_lifetime.label: Cache Lifetime (Seconds)
cache_lifetime.description: 86400 by default, if not set. To refresh instantly, Clear the Blocks HTML Output Cache.
